title: Mini Post 2-- 3b1b is a teacher
content: Instead of teaching kids Scratch, they should teach them Manim instead. Not only will it eliminate the kids who will probably drop out of cs later, but they also don't hit the limiting factors of scratch and can actually play with the beauty of computer science.
